body: My birthday is in a week and I am bored so ask me stuff and I will answer it awkwardly

replies.body: How did you come into defending, if that is what you do.
replies.body_tagged: How did you come into defending, if that is what you do.

replies.body: I do defend. My brother used to play on a lot of servers and came onto a CTW server[not ocn or avicus] he played there and became a great defender with a team. I asked him if he could teach me and he said no a few times but then taught me the basics with what a defender should know. I was only taught really just make sure you know if someone is attacking your wool lane or what ever you are defending. I then started applying this to ocn and soon enough I became a crapy defender. I improved in a year with his help and now I am not-so-crapy.
